name: @ngx-meta/bundle-size
description: ngx-meta lib bundle size analysis with source-map-explorer

scripts.a15:sme-json: mkdir -p a15 && pnpm run --silent a15:analyze-main-bundle --json > a15/source-map-explorer.json
scripts.a16:sme-json: mkdir -p a16 && pnpm run --silent a16:analyze-main-bundle --json > a16/source-map-explorer.json
scripts.a17:sme-json: mkdir -p a17 && pnpm run --silent a17:analyze-main-bundle --json > a17/source-map-explorer.json
